_header: True love among men that most is of let
Subjects: sermons, verse in; evils of the times
_description: On the True-love (vv. 4), a tag in the Fasciculus morum, four lines

Bod410.Transcription:
Trew lofe þat most is of lettin hattes in hedys In pursys sett
                    trewlof in gresses springes In maybut trewlof in hert is fer went a
                    way

BodLauMis213.Transcription:
Trew loue þat most is off lettin hattys & hodys in purces i
                    sette [sic]Trew loue in greses springtȝ in mayBut trew
                    loue in hert is fer went a way

BodLauMis111.Transcription:
Trewloue among men þat most ys of letIn hattes and in hoodes hit
                    ys y setTreweloue in herbes sprinketh in mayBut trewloue in hertes
                    vaniseth a way

BodRawC670.Transcription:
Trewe loue among men þat most is of letteIn hattes in hodes in
                    porses is setteTrewe loue in herbers spryngeth in mayBote trewe loue
                    of herte went is away
BodRawC670.Editions:
Silverstein,  Theodore,
                        ed.  
             Medieval English Lyrics.
         York Medieval Texts. London: Edw. Arnold, 1971: 98.
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle
                English Poems.
         Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978: 159-60.

CamGon71.Transcription:
Trew loue among men þer nogth es of lettin hatȝ in
                    purseȝ in hodeȝ is settNew loue in herbeȝ springis no
                    maybot trew loue of hert when it is away

CamGon364.Transcription:
Treweloue among men þat most is of lethIn hattis in hodis in
                    pursis is setTreweloue in herb spryngith in maybut trewloue in hertis
                    wansyth a way

CamStJohn159.Transcription:
Trewlof emang men þat is most of letIn hattys and hudis is
                    settTrewlof in herbers spryngis in mayBot trew lofe of hert went ys a
                    way

EDU82.Transcription:
Trewe love among men þat most is of lettIn hattes in hodes in
                    purses is settTrewe love in herebes sprynges in mayeBut trewe love of
                    hert went is a waye

Spalding.Transcription:
Trewe lofe amonge men þat most is of letin hattis in hodes in
                    purses er setTrewe lofe in herbes sprynges in maybot trew lofe of hert
                    went is a way

WorcF19.Transcription:
Trewe loue amongis men þat most ys forleteIn hattis in hodis in
                    purses is setTrewe loue in herbis springis in mayBot trewe loue of
                    herte went ys way
